entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/Enterprise-Scale
entry.content: The Azure Landing Zones (Enterprise-Scale) architecture provides prescriptive guidance coupled with Azure best practices, and it follows design principles across the critical design areas for organizations to define their Azure architecture

entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk
entry.content: This is the Azure SDK parent repository and mostly contains documentation around guidelines and policies as well as the releases for the various languages supported by the Azure SDK.

entry.title: https://github.com/Micke-K/IntuneManagement
entry.content: Copy, export, import, delete, document and compare policies and profiles in Intune and Azure with PowerShell script and WPF UI. Import ADMX files and registry settings with ADMX ingestion. View and edit PowerShell script.

entry.title: https://github.com/Romanitho/Winget-AutoUpdate
entry.content: WAU daily updates apps as system and notify connected users. (Allowlist and Blocklist support)

entry.title: https://github.com/cisagov/ScubaGear
entry.content: Automation to assess the state of your M365 tenant against CISA's baselines

entry.title: https://github.com/mandiant/flare-vm
entry.content: A collection of software installations scripts for Windows systems that allows you to easily setup and maintain a reverse engineering environment on a VM.

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoft/winget-pkgs
entry.content: The Microsoft community Windows Package Manager manifest repository

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoftgraph/microsoft-graph-docs-contrib
entry.content: Documentation for the Microsoft Graph REST API

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoftgraph/powershell-intune-samples
entry.content: This repository of PowerShell sample scripts show how to access Intune service resources. They demonstrate this by making HTTPS RESTful API requests to the Microsoft Graph API from PowerShell.

entry.title: https://github.com/samratashok/nishang
entry.content: Nishang - Offensive PowerShell for red team, penetration testing and offensive security.

entry.title: https://github.com/sdushantha/recycle-bin-themes
entry.content: Silly icons for the Windows Recycle Bin

entry.title: https://github.com/ugurkocde/IntuneBrew
entry.content: IntuneBrew is a PowerShell-based tool that simplifies the process of uploading and managing macOS applications in Microsoft Intune. It automates the entire workflow from downloading apps to uploading them to Intune, complete with proper metadata and logos.
